channel.title: Whonix run Iceweasel with proxy, Tor Service still in background?
channel.description: I will run Iceweasel (not Torbrowser) through a proxy but I don't know if whole traffic in the background would still run through tor? So I will change network settings in Iceweasel to run Iceweasel through a proxy. Would the traffic still first go through Tor and then through the proxy or just through the proxy and not through tor anymore?

item.title: Whonix run Iceweasel with proxy, Tor Service still in background?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I will run Iceweasel (not Torbrowser) through a proxy but I don't know if whole traffic in the background would still run through tor?
Everything from Whonix-Workstation conceptually always must go though Tor. No way around that.
So I will change network settings in Iceweasel to run Iceweasel through a proxy. Would the traffic still first go through Tor and then through the proxy or just through the proxy and not through tor anymore?
user -> Tor -> proxy -> destination

See also documentation on tunneling stuff:

Whonix

Features

Whonix Feature List

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix run Iceweasel with proxy, Tor Service still in background?
